SEARCH
Package state

Class WorkItem

java.lang.Object
state.WorkItem
public class WorkItem extends Object
Represents a work item with an operator and associated control and target values. This class can handle both single control/target and multiple controls/targets scenarios.
Since:
4 July 2024
Version:
0.1
Author:
Robert Smith

    Constructs a WorkItem with single controls and two targets.

    Constructs a WorkItem with multiple controls and/or targets.

      target - The target value.

      public WorkItem(String operator, int control, int targetOne, int targetTwo)

      control - An array of control values.
      targetOne - The first target qubit.
      targetTwo - The second target qubit.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      To string for the work item outputs

        Single-qubit gates in format operator, Target qubit: qubit#

      Multi-qubit gates in format

        Controls: qubit#, qubit# Targets: qubit#, qubit#
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String of the work item

    • getTheta

      public double getTheta()
      Returns the theta value of this WorkItem object
      Returns:
      the double value of this WorkItem's theta field
